songs.title: Bullshit
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Mmm-mmm-mmm-mm
You think the hood is cute?

[Verse 1]
You think the hood is cute?
Like you playing dressed up in your mama shoes
Say you got a grill and a few tattoos
And you keep a couple ratchet girls with you
You think it's cute?
'Cause they taught you how to shake your butt
And you even learned how to roll a blunt
Say you got a hood pass, but your only hood pass
Is that one time you got lost, and you passed the hood

[Pre-Chorus]
So you got your dookie braids and your bamboos
'Cause you wanna live like Brooke Candy do
But if you ain't never stood in a welfare booth
I'm calling you out

[Chorus]
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit

[Verse 2]
You think this is a game?
White girls selling myself for the fame
Guess I'm a drug dealer, spittin' cocaine
Where's your clothes, girl? Where's your shame?
I got none, hoe, where's your brain?
Ever had to strip? Show your tits for tips?
Smoking it all away with a spliff?
Say you got a hood pass, but your only hood pass
Is that one time you got lost, and you passed the hood

[Pre-Chorus]
You got your big girl chains and your shiny shoes
And your white girl friend got a fatty too
But if you never been in line and your card declined
I'm calling you out

[Chorus]
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit

[Post-Chorus]
If you ain't about it ('Bout it)
When it goes down (It goes down)
Ain't no doubt about it ('Bout it)
I'm calling you out

[Chorus]
Bullshit
(Yeah yeah yeah)
Bullshit
(Yeah yeah yeah)
Bullshit
Bullshit
(Yeah yeah yeah)

[Bridge]
Yeah yeah yeah
Woo-ooo-oow
Yeah yeah yeah
Woo-ooo-oow
Yeah yeah yeah
Woo-ooo-oow
Yeah yeah yeah
Woo-ooo-oow

[Pre-Chorus]
See, you can be a fan from near or far
As long as you are who you really are
'Cause if you ain't never ducked from a police cab
I'm calling you out

[Chorus]
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit
Bullshit

[Post-Chorus]
If you ain't about it ('Bout it)
When it goes down (Goes down)
Ain't now doubt about it ('Bout it)
I'm calling you out

[Chorus]
(Yeah yeah yeah)
Bullshit
(Yeah yeah yeah)
Bullshit
Bullshit
(Yeah yeah yeah)
Bullshit
